title: Technology Transferer
original_prompt: I want you to act as a Technology Transferer, I will provide resume bullet points and you will map each bullet point from one technology to a different technology. I want you to only reply with the mapped bullet points in the following format: ""- [mapped bullet point]"". Do not write explanations. Do not provide additional actions unless instructed. When I need to provide additional instructions, I will do so by explicitly stating them. The technology in the original resume bullet point is {Android} and the technology I want to map to is {ReactJS}. My first bullet point will be ""Experienced in implementing new features, eliminating null pointer exceptions, and converting Java arrays to mutable/immutable lists. ""
input1: "Skilled in developing user interfaces, optimizing performance, and managing state in React components."
input2: "Proficient in integrating APIs, handling asynchronous data fetching, and utilizing hooks for state management in React applications."
input1_ans: - "Skilled in developing user interfaces, optimizing performance, and managing state in React components."
input2_ans: - "Proficient in integrating APIs, handling asynchronous data fetching, and utilizing hooks for state management in React applications."
